\w But|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w prince|strong="H5081"\w* \w will|strong="H1931"\w* devise \w such|strong="H1931"\w* things \w as|strong="H6965"\w* are worthy \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w prince|strong="H5081"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H1931"\w* \w stand|strong="H6965"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* rulers.

Be astonished, ye rich women, be \w troubled|strong="H7264"\w*, ye \w confident|strong="H0982"\w* ones: \w strip|strong="H6584"\w* yen, \w and|strong="H7264"\w* be confounded, \w gird|strong="H2296"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w loins|strong="H2504"\w*.
